```py
w1 = np.array([1., 0., 1.])
w2 = np.array([0., 1., 1.])
A = np.stack((w1, w2),axis=-1)
b = np.array([0., 0., 2.])
x = LA.solve(A.T @ A, A.T @ b)
print(x) 
```
